description: A 4f orbital with symmetrical distribution around the nucleus, featuring complex lobes and nodal structures.
shape: complex lobed structure with high symmetry
orientation: symmetrical around the nucleus, with distinctive lobes extending outwards

nodes.orientation: multiple, symmetrical planes through the nucleus
nodes.description: Planar nodes that intersect at the nucleus, dividing the orbital into distinct lobes indicative of the complex electron probability distribution.
Radial nodes indicating regions of zero electron probability at specific radii from the nucleus, characteristic of the 4f orbital's distribution.
